mapper.select: select bc.comment_no, b.board_no, b.board_title, mi.mem_nickname, bc.comment_date, bc.comment_content from board_comment bc inner join board_post b on bc.board_no = b.board_no inner join member_info mi on bc.mem_no = mi.mem_no where mi.mem_no = #{mem_no}
select b.board_no, b.board_title, m.mem_nickname,b.board_date,b.board_hit from board_post b inner join member_info m on b.mem_no = m.mem_no where m.mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.update: update member_info set mem_id=#{mem_id}, mem_email=#{mem_email}, mem_name=#{mem_name}, mem_nickname=#{mem_nickname}, mem_content=#{mem_content}, mem_img=#{mem_img} where mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.select: select mem_name, mem_id, mem_email, mem_nickname, mem_img, mem_content from member_info where mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.insert: insert into member_message(post_no, mem_no, post_from, post_to, post_title , post_content, post_ref_no, post_read, post_reply, post_regidate) values ((select nvl(max(post_no), 0) + 1 from member_message), #{mem_no}, #{post_from}, #{post_to}, #{post_title} , #{post_content}, #{post_ref_no}, #{post_read}, #{post_reply}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select rownum r, post_no, mem_no, mem_nickname, post_title , post_content, post_ref_no, post_read, post_reply, post_regidate from(select msg.post_no, msgto.mem_no, msgto.mem_nickname, msg.post_title , substr(msg.post_content, 0, 10) post_content, msg.post_ref_no, case msg.post_read when 0 then '안읽음' when 1 then '읽음' end post_read, msg.post_reply, msg.post_regidate from member_message msg inner join member_info msgfrom on msg.mem_no = msgfrom.mem_no inner join member_info msgto on msg.post_to = msgto.mem_no where msgfrom.mem_no = #{mem_no} order by msg.post_no desc )

select rownum r, post_no, mem_no, mem_nickname, post_title , post_content, post_ref_no, post_read, post_reply, post_regidate from(select msg.post_no, msgfrom.mem_no, msgfrom.mem_nickname, msg.post_title , substr(msg.post_content, 0, 10) post_content, msg.post_ref_no, case msg.post_read when 0 then '안읽음' when 1 then '읽음' end post_read, msg.post_reply, msg.post_regidate from member_message msg inner join member_info msgfrom on msg.mem_no = msgfrom.mem_no inner join member_info msgto on msg.post_to = msgto.mem_no where msgto.mem_no = #{mem_no} order by msg.post_no desc )

select rownum r, post_no, mem_no, mem_nickname, post_title , post_content, post_ref_no, post_regidate from(select msg.post_no, msgto.mem_no, msgfrom.mem_nickname, msg.post_title , msg.post_content, msg.post_ref_no, msg.post_regidate from member_message msg inner join member_info msgfrom on msg.mem_no = msgfrom.mem_no inner join member_info msgto on msg.post_to = msgto.mem_no where msgto.mem_no = #{mem_no} and msg.post_no = #{post_no} )
